alert.note: Alert for Owl Creek and Bridger Mountains; Wind River Basin (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 25 at 2:46PM MDT by NWS Riverton
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of south central Hot Springs and northeastern Fremont Counties through 345 PM MDT... At 246 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Hidden Valley, or near Shoshoni, moving north at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Boysen State Park around 250 PM MDT. Shoshoni around 300 PM MDT. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Owl Creek and Bridger Mountains; Wind River Basin
